Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

first time in this forum so, hope you treat me well ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

I finally managed to dock two space stations (quite a hard job, because both were pretty long and the SAS shook more than MJ Fox) but now I have a problem. It seems that my dock was useless because I just wanted to transfer fuel from one station to another so I could send that to Mun. But when I ALT+Right click it appears the option of fuel transfer but the IN and OUT buttons appear just for 1 milisecond and then stay blocked. (First the button look blue and then just like plain text). And even if I click there or something nothing happens.

I need your help or my mission would be stupid.

Thank you very much ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Are you playing in career mode? If so, you need to have upgraded the R&D facility to at least tier 2. Which (thinking about it) you must have done to unlock docking ports in the first place, so that's not the problem.

Can you post a screen shot with the resource tab in the upper right open and the Alt-Right-Click menus of both tanks open?

Also, are you using any mods?

> 
> Are you playing in career mode? If so, you need to have upgraded the R&D facility to at least tier 2. Which (thinking about it) you must have done to unlock docking ports in the first place, so that's not the problem.
> Can you post a screen shot with the resource tab in the upper right open and the Alt-Right-Click menus of both tanks open?
> 
> Also, are you using any mods?

No, I'm in sandbox mode.

Later I'll post a screen shot

I'm using a few mods, now I can't remember which ones.

> 
> No, I'm in sandbox mode.
> Later I'll post a screen shot
> 
> I'm using a few mods, now I can't remember which ones.

The mods could be the problem, weren't there mods that messed with fuel balancing by transferring fuel around?
it's the first time that this happens to me, so I have no idea.
